Title: Requires municipalities to submit a multi-year financial plan to the comptroller
Summary: Requires municipalities to submit a multi-year financial plan to the comptroller which shall identify actions necessary to achieve and maintain long-term fiscal stability.
LawCode: Add ยง40, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring municipalities to submit a multi-year financial plan to the comptroller
